SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: The response is a simple success value. On error, however, the success variable will not be present and the standard error structure will be returned instead.

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The contactID of the user. This is the value returned by the create contact API method.

PARAMETERS.NAME: noteCodeID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The noteCodeID for the aXcelerate note to attach to the contact. If left blank will default to leaving a system message

PARAMETERS.NAME: type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course type. w = workshop, p = accredited program, el = e-learning. Don't use this param for a general enquiry.

PARAMETERS.NAME: ID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ID relating to the course type. Leave blank or don't include for a general enquiry.

PARAMETERS.NAME: emailTo
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: An email to send the enquiry to. It can be a comma delimited list of emails. If blank, an email will not be sent.

DESCRIPTION: Allows an established contact to enquire on a course, or send a general enquiry. This must be called with a valid aXcelerate contactID.
